text: Siv Widerberg (12 June 1931 - 24 December 2020) was a Swedish writer and journalist. She received doctor honoris causa from the University of Umeå. She was born in Bromma, Sweden. She was a member of the Swedish Academy for Children's Books. Widerberg died on 24 December 2020 in Stockholm, aged 89.Författaren Siv Widerberg är död ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish journalists Category:Writers from Stockholm
title: Siv Widerberg
